attributes.action: Release Government funds to ensure Windsor Park (NI National Football Stadium) is complient with UEFA safety standards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thus making sure that the Northern Ireland international football team does not become the only UK home nation to play "Home" matches outside its borders>

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Release Government funds to ensure Windsor Park (NI National Football Stadium) is complient with UEFA safety standards."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14243.asp

Prime Minister's Office
